  % \begin{frontmatterTemplate}[article]
  % \expectedDocumentClass{article}

  \title{\frontloader@title}

  \author{
    \ForEachAuthor[
      separator={\\}
    ]{
      \AuthorFirstMLastName{}% <- No space
      \IfAuthorHasEmail{%
        \ % <- space (possibly breaking)
        (\AuthorEmail{})
      }%
    }
  }

    % Generate title page
